item.title: xAI’s new Grok image and video generator has a ‘spicy’ mode
item.description: xAI’s new Grok Imagine tool is an AI image and video generator that encourages users to make NSFW content. In contrast to rival generative AI video tools like Google’s Veo and OpenAI’s Sora, which try

item.title: This ‘violently racist’ hacker claims to be the source of The New York Times’ Mamdani scoop
